title: Build AST-aware code search with tree-sitter
description: Build AST-aware code search using tree-sitter queries for semantic code structure queries. Implement query language for finding code patterns like 'functions with error handling', 'async functions returning Result', etc. Handle large files (>10k LOC) efficiently by chunking. Ensure invalid query syntax returns clear errors.

title: Implement persistence layer for knowledge graph
description: Implement persistence layer for knowledge graph with incremental updates and versioning. Store graph state to disk, restore on restart, handle corrupted files by triggering rebuild instead of crash. Support incremental updates when single file changes - reindex only affected symbols without full rebuild. Add versioning for graph snapshots.

title: bd prime output has wrong CLI syntax for bd create command
description:
The bd prime output shows incorrect syntax:

```
bd create --title="..." --type=task|bug|feature --priority=2
```

But the actual CLI syntax is:

```
bd create "Title here" --type=task --priority=2
```

The title is a positional argument, not a --title flag. This causes confusion when users copy-paste the example.
close_reason: Fixed locally in beads repo commit 00239e82

title: Build Beads molecules for codebase workflows
description: Build Beads molecules for codebase indexing and query workflows. Create formulas: codebase-index (full pipeline with issue tracking), codebase-query (query workflows with auto-discovery), graph-maintenance (incremental updates). Ensure index failures create issues with error context. Support incremental index updates on re-run.

title: Implement hybrid query engine with rank fusion
description: Implement hybrid query engine combining lexical (BM25), vector (Qdrant), and AST (tree-sitter) search with reciprocal rank fusion. Ensure queries return results ranked by relevance across all three layers. Handle no-results gracefully without errors. Support returning top N results even when 100+ matches exist.

title: Design unified knowledge graph data model
description: Design unified knowledge graph data model representing code symbols, files, and cross-references. Define structures for Symbol, File, and Edge nodes with bidirectional reference tracking. Support metadata for type definitions, signatures, scope, and modules. Ensure graph can handle >100k symbols without performance degradation.
close_reason: Implemented CodeGraph with SymbolNode, FileNode, Edge structures. See crates/g3-index/src/graph.rs

title: Create autonomous agent navigation tools
description: Create autonomous agent navigation tools for symbol lookup, reference finding, and dependency traversal. Implement tools: find_symbol (go-to-definition), find_references (all usages), call_hierarchy (incoming/outgoing calls), semantic_search (natural language queries), traverse_graph (dependency paths). Ensure invalid symbol locations return helpful errors. Handle call hierarchy depth >10 without recursion errors.

title: Integrate LSP static analysis for knowledge graph
description: Integrate LSP static analysis to enrich knowledge graph with definition locations, references, and symbol types. Enhance LspManager to extract symbol metadata from multiple language servers (rust-analyzer, pylsp, etc.). Ensure go-to-definition resolves correctly across files and projects support 500+ files indexed in <60 seconds.
